column5: What happened to Dave Mercer?  He lost a lot of weight when I saw his Calcutta D advertise.  He used to have a big belly right?  Hope everything is al-right for him.
You can read all about it here belippy:  Dave's Journey
Wasnt he a subwy commit to fit ambassador ?
Dave has never felt better and good for him.

I do believe,when Dave seen me go from 235,down to 175 a couple years back,and I looked so much better then him,he had no choice,but to take the Challenge.  All fun aside, it,s not easy. I bow to Dave for doing what he has done,and the weight he has lost.  It,s a lot of work,and takes commitment. Been there,done that.  Dave,,,,,,,,,,,
I am proud of Dave simply for having the focus, discipline and determination to work towards whatever his goals are. Good on him.
Whatever his reasons were, it takes dedication to achieve what he did.... bottom line.  I want to follow in his footsteps!  Good on ya Dave!!!!
